Description_lang: Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing $<damage> Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by $s1% for $d. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet. $?s231548[Bestial Wrath's remaining cooldown is reduced by $s3 sec each time you use Barbed Shot][]$?s193532[ and activating Bestial Wrath grants $s2 $Lcharge:charges; of Barbed Shot.][]$?s231548&!s193532[.][]

description_blz.en_US: Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 0 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
description_blz.es_MX: Te llena de ira a ti y a tu mascota, lo que inflige 0 p. de daño físico de forma inmediata a su objetivo y aumenta todo el daño que ambos infligen un 30% durante 15 s. Elimina todos los efectos de control de masas que afectan a tu mascota.
description_blz.pt_BR: Enfurece você e seu ajudante, causando instantaneamente 0 de dano Físico ao alvo e aumentando em 30% todo o dano que vocês dois causam por 15 s. Remove todos os efeitos de controle coletivo do seu ajudante.
description_blz.de_DE: Versetzt Euch selbst und Euren Begleiter in Rage, wodurch Ihr sofort seinem Ziel 0 körperlichen Schaden zufügt und sowohl Ihr als auch Euer Begleiter 30% mehr Schaden verursacht. Hält 15 Sek. lang an. Entfernt alle Kontrollverlusteffekte von Eurem Begleiter.
description_blz.en_GB: Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 0 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
description_blz.es_ES: Tu mascota y tú montáis en cólera, lo que inflige 0 p. de daño físico instantáneamente al objetivo y aumenta un 30% todo el daño que ambos infligís durante 15 s. Elimina los efectos de control de masas de tu mascota.
description_blz.fr_FR: Votre familier et vous entrez dans une rage folle, ce qui inflige immédiatement 0 points de dégâts physiques à sa cible et augmente vos dégâts à tous les deux de 30% pendant 15 s. Dissipe les effets de contrôle affectant votre familier.  et l’activation de Courroux bestial confère 0 charge de Tir acéré.[]
description_blz.it_IT: Fa infuriare te e il tuo famiglio, infliggendo istantaneamente 0 danni fisici al bersaglio e aumentando tutti i danni inflitti da entrambi del 30% per 15 s. Dissolve tutti gli effetti di controllo delle controllo delle creature dal tuo famiglio.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вас и вашего питомца охватывает ярость, в результате чего наносимый вами обоими урон увеличивается на 30% на 15 сек., а ваша цель мгновенно получает 0 ед. физического урона. Снимает с вашего питомца все эффекты контроля.
description_blz.ko_KR: 시전자와 야수가 광폭해져 대상에게 즉시 0의 물리 피해를 입힙니다. 또한 15초 동안 시전자와 야수의 모든 공격력이 30%만큼 증가합니다. 야수에게 걸린 모든 군중 제어 효과를 제거합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你和寵物進入狂怒狀態，立即對目標造成0點物理傷害，並且使你們造成的傷害提高30%，持續15秒。移除你寵物身上的所有控場效果。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你和你的宠物进入狂怒状态，立即对宠物的目标造成0点物理伤害，你和宠物造成的伤害提高30%，持续15秒。移除你的宠物受到的所有群体控制效果。
